dashboards.title: Cluster cost & utilization metrics
parse_errors:
query=sum(
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}) by (node)
 ) * $costpcpu
 )
 or
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) * ($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))
 )
) : 7:6: parse error: unexpected character: '$'

 (

 or

 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) /1024/1024/1024 * ($costram - ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))
)
) : 7:22: parse error: unexpected character: '$'
